name: University of Waterloo - Student Medical Clinic
comment:
Student medical clinic * doctors and nurses assess and treat minor illnesses and injuries

Services include:
  • gender affirmative care
  • verification of illness services
  • mental health office
  • sexually transmitted infection (STI) testing
  • pregnancy and birth control
  • on-site lab
  • allergy injections
  • immunizations
  • wart clinic
  • family health clinic
